meta.title: Book-a-Dev
meta.description: Book-a-Dev — Consult a developer for your new project!

article.title: Need developers?
article.paragraph: Book them here, per sprint. Experienced developers from their own country, eager to tackle your challenges. People who fit perfectly in agile development teams. To compensate for a temporary shortage, to set up or strengthen a team with specific expertise.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.description: Smart developers, only when you need them. Per sprint.

rapid.title: Rapid
rapid.description: No time consuming recruitment process. A match? To work!

experienced.title: Experienced
experienced.description: Experienced developers who match your tech stack.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: We are also close by at a (safe) distance. Communication remains key.

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: Some of the people who make your projects come true.
